Justify Content
slides.content:
# Justify Content (Main Axis) ‚ÜîÔ∏è

Aligns items along the main axis (usually horizontal).

- `flex-start` (default): Start of container.
- `flex-end`: End of container.
- `center`: Centered.
- `space-between`: Space between items.
- `space-around`: Space around items.

```css
.flex-container {
  justify-content: center;
}
```

slides.title: Intro to CSS Grid
Grid Columns and Rows
Grid Gap
slides.content:
# Grid Gap üï≥Ô∏è

You can set the gap (gutter) between rows and columns.

- `column-gap`
- `row-gap`
- `gap` (shorthand)

```css
.grid-container {
  display: grid;
  gap: 20px 50px; /* row column */
}
```

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Summary üìê

Modern layouts are built with Flexbox and Grid.

## Comparison

| Feature | Flexbox | Grid |
|---|---|---|
| Dimension | 1D (Row or Col) | 2D (Row & Col) |
| Alignment | Content-first | Layout-first |
| Best for | Components, Navbars | Page layouts |
